data.text:
@stopthesqueal_ @fitterhappierAJ … but not ‘mask theatre’ (healthcare staff coming to work while known to be infected and given surgical masks only) (and cloth face coverings)

 - while the gov’t hide away and appear in the best N95 or better respirators when no one is around.
@JerKaphant @fitterhappierAJ Wow. That’s so bad. What’s the general attitude of the public? No more protections? Or do people want to go back to what worked?

@stopthesqueal_ @fitterhappierAJ 6/3 🧵- when needed, ‘cloth face coverings’ fulfil mask criteria.

And that is how a government betrays the people and suddenly brings their country into full synchronisation of the rest of the commonwealth.

No ‘scientific’ reason why they did this 😥

<end> 6/6 🧵

@stopthesqueal_ @fitterhappierAJ 5/3 🧵- the public health response to be ‘highest restriction level is gyms open (1m distancing), restaurants (wear masks when not sitting down), nightclubs open.

Now, we are mostly moved to ‘DIY contact tracing, tell your mates yourself’. And masks? ‘face coverings’. When

@stopthesqueal_ @fitterhappierAJ 4/3 🧵- this was admitted to help overcome hesitancy. For summer, the rest of NZ was warned the lockdown (in the biggest city with 1/4? of our entire population; parliament is in a different city…) would end, and COVID would ‘hunt down the unvaccinated’. Then the gov’t modified

@stopthesqueal_ @fitterhappierAJ 3/3 🧵- and supermarket shelves empty etc.

The anti-lockdown sentiment grew hugely when the government switched to ‘keeping R just above 1.0’ (later admitting this was to ‘nudge’ people into vaccination) - doing a 3 month deliberate leaky lockdown August-Dec 2022; this was

@stopthesqueal_ @fitterhappierAJ 2/3 🧵- causing this. Even the protests at parliament; the covid wave went totally out of control across NZ; the protestors weren’t involved in that - dropping almost all public health measures was. We have tested infectious healthcare staff coming to work in surgical masks, and https://t.co/kjoxItDWgb

@stopthesqueal_ @fitterhappierAJ The gov’t did this to us! This is a short history of how the current disaster unfolded.

The NZ gov’t won a landslide election on their #ZeroCovid response, then reversed it without any consultation. Freezer trucks any minute now. It is the gov’t, not the people, causing 1/2 🧵 https://t.co/zXkEL3I9Ov
